as we enter the bell rings

ding! it sings, water bubbles

feeding the bait, near cold beer

bratwurst in the rear, doubles

------------------------------------------------------------------------

written with Leah Shepard near the [Minnesota Woman Suffrage Memorial](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minnesota_Woman_Suffrage_Memorial)
